name.baseName: 煤炭井工开采;开采煤炭

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The data set represents CO2 escape emission factors for low-gas underground coal mines in China and is intended for use in evaluating the environmental impact of coal mining processes. It details the carbon emissions associated with the excavation of coal from underground mines, factoring in the impact of gas recovery and torch destruction measures. This data can be used to assess the carbon footprint of products and electricity generated from coal mined via these processes.
该数据集代表中国低瓦斯井工煤矿的CO2逃逸排放因子，用于评估煤炭开采过程的环境影响。它详细记录了从地下矿井开采煤炭的碳排放，考虑了瓦斯回收和火炬销毁措施的影响。此数据可用于评估由通过这些过程开采的煤矿所产生的产品和电力的碳足迹。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: According to the measured data of CO2 relative emission in 5584 low-gas mines among 7575 underground coal mines in China in 2011, the CO2 escape emission factors in the mining process of low-gas underground coal mines in China were calculated and analyzed.
根据中国2011年7575处井工煤矿矿井中的5584处低瓦斯矿井的CO2相对涌出量的测定数据，对中国低瓦斯井工煤矿开采过程的CO2逃逸排放因子进行了计算和分析。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set represents CO2 escape emission factors for low-gas underground coal mines in China and is intended for use in evaluating the environmental impact of coal mining processes. It details the carbon emissions associated with the excavation of coal from underground mines, factoring in the impact of gas recovery and torch destruction measures. This data can be used to assess the carbon footprint of products and electricity generated from coal mined via these processes.
该数据集代表中国低瓦斯井工煤矿的CO2逃逸排放因子，用于评估煤炭开采过程的环境影响。它详细记录了从地下矿井开采煤炭的碳排放，考虑了瓦斯回收和火炬销毁措施的影响。此数据可用于评估由通过这些过程开采的煤矿所产生的产品和电力的碳足迹。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The emission sources of CO2 escape in the process of underground coal mining are sorted out, and a calculation method based on emission factors is proposed to calculate the total amount of CO2 emission, and then consider the reduction contribution of gas recovery and / or the incremental contribution of torch destruction. Secondly, according to the measured data of CO2 relative emission of 5584 low gas mines in 7575 underground coal mines in China in 2011, the CO2 escape emission factors in the mining process of low gas underground coal mines in China were calculated and analyzed.
梳理了井工煤矿开采过程CO2逃逸的排放来源，提出了一种基于排放因子先计算CO2排放总量，再分别考虑瓦斯气回收的减量贡献和/或火炬销毁的增量贡献的计算方法。其次根据中国2011年7575处井工煤矿矿井中5584处低瓦斯矿井的CO2相对涌出量的测定 数据，对中国低瓦斯井工煤矿开采过程的CO2逃逸排放因子进行了计算和分析。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 于胜民, 朱松丽, & 张俊龙. 中国井工煤矿开采过程的二氧化碳逃逸排放因子研究. 中国能源 40, 10-16+33 (2018).
于胜民, 朱松丽, & 张俊龙. 中国井工煤矿开采过程的二氧化碳逃逸排放因子研究. 中国能源 40, 10-16+33 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set for Life Cycle Assessments, users should take into account the methodological framework provided for the calculation of CO2 emissions. Ensure the inclusion of all emission sources and consider the reduction from gas recovery and the increase from torch destruction. Apply this data in line with the specifics of your impact assessment model for low-gas underground coal mining, particularly when calculating the GHG emissions of energy products derived from the mined coal.
在利用此数据集进行生命周期评估时，用户应考虑提供的CO2排放计算方法框架。确保包括所有排放源，并考虑瓦斯回收的减排和火炬销毁的增排。根据您的低瓦斯井工煤矿影响评估模型的具体内容，特别是在计算来自煤矿开采的能源产品的温室气体排放时，应用此数据。

completeness.common:other: The output flow of CO2 is complete.

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Emission factor, the average CO2 escape emission factor of low-gas mines is 5.41m3—that is, 5.41m3 of CO2 is released for every 1 ton of coal mined. The CO2 escape emission factors of low-gas mines in 7575 mines are not normally distributed but are generally similar.
CO2逃逸排放因子,低瓦斯矿井CO2逃逸排放因子均值为5.41m3—即每开采1t煤炭释放5.41m3的CO2。7575处矿井中的低瓦斯矿井CO2逃逸排放因子均非正态分布但大体近似。
2011年中国井工煤矿低瓦斯矿井组开采1吨煤炭。
2011年中国井工煤矿低瓦斯矿井组开采1吨煤炭释放的CO2量。
